I dont care at all about this ntr shit dramus made all I care about is the other one where the MC gets cucked and he finally made MC get a better girlfriend I guess.
@Stck Maybe Itou Eight : Wakachiai Shared Love "117329"

Its the twin suster wearing a wig, she pretended to be the wife and tooks sex pics with the other man, then blackmailed the wife saying that shell show the husband the pics if they dont switch. Then the tein sister fucks the husband and the wife has to get ntrd by the other guy. Kind of dumb since the husband would have to be an idiot not to realise its the sister and now the wife has done the exact thing she was afraid of being framed for.  
That said, its the exact same plot of another one that Im trying hard to remember the name of

@Blankroom it's basically like " if I show this pic around people will think it's you and since we're identical you can't really disprove it, especially with me walkin around blonde and shit". Makes sense in context that the sis would be uneasy about that since the beginning argument is about the other twin pullin the same shit and confessing to a boy as the other twin for fun

That's what I was thinking too, the gyaru sister probably made herself look like her sister and slept with the dude posing as her to use as blackmail against her. It doesn't look that hard to disguise herself. Yeah, seems pretty dumb all around, the gyaru sister is just insane honestly, wanting her sister to be just as depraved as her to do this whole switch.
I really wonder what she blackmailed her with. Did she actually fuck another guy or is she lying and that's her sister posing as her (porno maybe)? Either reason is dumb as shit to hide about.
So you are telling me the dude can't tell apart his wife and her sister. It turns me off even tho I know it's a hentai -_-
what the fuck dramus, you lil sick fuck. I love it
